title: Normal Eggs?
question_text:
At Taylor Farms, chickens are free-range and happily produce over $25$ eggs per day. Ms. Taylor weighs each egg that her chickens lay and records the data in a spreadsheet. Over the past five years, she has collected and weighed $40{,}000$ eggs. A random selection of $12$ eggs is gathered for the local farmers market each Friday.
Under which circumstance can Taylor assume that the sampling distribution of average weight of a sample of $12$ eggs is approximately Normal?
  1. The population of $40{,}000$ eggs is approximately Normal
  2. The population of $40{,}000$ eggs is skewed left
  3. The population of $40{,}000$ eggs is skewed right

choices.text:
I
I
&
I
I
I
only

I
,
I
I
, &
I
